description: As they read a variety of mostly contemporary literature from English-speaking countries around the world, students learn strategies of critical analysis and interpretation. They also practice and develop skills in writing and oral communication. This course is required of those beginning the English major. It is not recommended for general education students. For more information on this course please go to: http://www.stolaf.edu/depts/english/courses/index.html
name: Literary Studies
notes: Not open to Juniors and Seniors.
